Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the alpha-defensin family (Theta subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: RTD-1 and RTD-5 are 3-fold more active than RTD-4.

Literature.Title: Rhesus macaque {theta}-defensin isoforms expression, antimicrobial activities, and demonstration of a prominent role in neutrophil granule microbicidal activities.
Literature.Author: Tongaonkar P, Tran P, Roberts K, Schaal J, Osapay G, Tran D, Ouellette AJ, Selsted ME.
